nodes.title: MetaMask feature update: Portfolio view on Extension
nodes.subtitle: One view to rule them all.

image.title: MetaMask feature update Portfolio view
image.description: MetaMask's new Portfolio view feature update lets you see all your tokens across all chains in a single view

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Managing your crypto should be easy. Thatâ€™s why MetaMaskâ€™s new extension update lets you see all your tokens across all chains on the home screen. No more switching between different tabs and windows.

Portfolio view on MetaMask Extension makes it simple to organize your assets and understand your portfolioâ€™s combined value. This means you can focus on the important things â€“ like buying, swapping, and staking crypto.

Portfolio view is our latest update that lets you keep tabs on your crypto every step of the way. Weâ€™ve also redesigned transaction confirmations and signature requests, so you can clearly see what youâ€™re actually signing. And to make sure youâ€™re always staying safe, weâ€™ll send you an alert when youâ€™re interacting with a new address for the first time too.

TL;DR: we got you.

Download Metamask Extension to get started. Need more help? Head to MetaMask Support.

nodes.metaTitle: MetaMask feature update: Portfolio view on Extension
nodes.metaDescription: Manage your crypto effortlessly with MetaMask's Portfolio view. Organize all your tokens across all chains, and easily track your assets' combined value.

nodes.title: Layer3 x MetaMask: creating interactive experiences in the decentralized web
nodes.subtitle: Meet the builders who are transforming web3, in our More With MetaMask Partner Series.

image.title: MetaMask x Layer3: Creating interactive experiences in the decentralized web
image.description: MetaMask x Layer3: Creating interactive experiences in the decentralized web

childMarkdownRemark.html:
MetaMask is the gateway to the decentralized web, enabling you to do more. Users can connect to any dapp, on any network, from any device. From DeFi to DeSci, gaming to NFTs, and beyond: MetaMask is passionate about the web3 community. Our More With MetaMask Partner Series shines a light on builders who are innovating across the ecosystem. Next up, Layer3.

Layer3's mission is to help protocols grow and educate their ecosystems, while empowering people to explore and participate in diverse blockchain environments. UsersÂ are encouraged to actively engage, earning incentives and completing meaningful interactions across different protocols. This turns learning into a tangible, rewarding journey. With MetaMask acting as a secure gateway, Layer3 makes blockchain exploration accessible rather than a daunting challenge.

Transforming blockchain education with Layer3

Web3, aka the decentralized web, represents more than just a technological shift. It's a fundamental reimagining of digital interactions. Unlike traditional centralized systems, web3 offers true ownership, transparency, and user empowerment. However, the complexity of blockchain technologies has created a significant barrier to entry, preventing many from experiencing these revolutionary benefits.

Making web3 accessible and rewarding

Layer3 solves this critical problem by creating a guided, incentive-driven pathway into web3. Instead of overwhelming users with technical details, Layer3 breaks down blockchain interactions into understandable campaigns. A learn-by-doing approach transforms exploration into an adventure, where each interaction becomes a learning opportunity and every completed campaign brings tangible rewards.

MetaMask's role in blockchain exploration

MetaMask has been instrumental in this journey, providing the secure infrastructure that allows users to seamlessly interact with Layer3's platform. Its powerful wallet enables users to explore web3 with confidence, traversing different blockchains with ease. Since launching, Layer3 has connected over 4 million wallets, demonstrating how a learn-by-doing approach can make web3 accessible and exciting for users across the globe.

Connect your MetaMask wallet, and begin your first Layer3 campaign today.

nodes.metaDescription: Discover how Layer3 and MetaMask are transforming web3 user engagement. Explore and earn rewards through interactive campaigns.

nodes.title: How to swap crypto
nodes.subtitle: Thousands of tokens at your fingertips.

image.title: How to swap crypto with MetaMask
image.description: How to swap crypto with MetaMask

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Swapping crypto is fast, easy, and secure with MetaMask. You can choose from thousands of your favorite tokens across nine networks including Ethereum, Linea, Base, and Arbitrum. MetaMask Swaps also include gas fees right in your quotes, making swapping crypto as smooth as can be.

We've simplified cross-chain swapping too. Send&Swap lets you choose the token you want to spend and the token you want the other person to receive â€” all in one move. As ever, safety is essential when it comes to your digital assets. So rest easy. MetaMask Swaps are powered by our razor-tight, industry-leading security.

Below, you'll find step-by-step guides showing you how to swap crypto with MetaMask.

Letâ€™s get into it! ğŸ¦Š

How to swap crypto with MetaMask Extension

  1. Open the MetaMask browser extension.
  2. Select the network you want to swap on, and click the Swap button.
  3. Select the token you want to swap from. Example: ETH.
  4. Enter the amount that you want to swap.
  5. Select the token you want to swap to. Example: DAI.
  6. A preferred quote will be loaded automatically. To select a different quote, click View all quotes.
  7. Click Swap to confirm.

Success! ğŸ¦Š

How to swap crypto with MetaMask App

  1. Sign-in to your MetaMask mobile app.
  2. Select the network you want to swap on, located at the top of your screen. Example: Ethereum Mainnet.
  3. Tap the menu button, which has two arrows in opposite directions and is located on the bottom of your homepage screen.
  4. Tap Swap.
  5. Select the token you want to swap from by tapping the token name that appears under your wallet address. Example: ETH.
  6. Enter the amount that you want to swap.
  7. Select the token you want to swap to. Example: DAI.
  8. Tap Get quotes to proceed. Note: you can manually select a different quote from our range of industry-leading providers.
  9. Tap Swap to confirm.

Success! ğŸ¦Š

How to swap crypto with MetaMask Portfolio

  1. Connect your MetaMask wallet to portfolio.metamask.io
  2. Click Move crypto.
  3. Click Swap.
  4. Select the network you want to swap from in the dropdown menu. Example: Ethereum.
  5. Select the token you want to swap from. Example: ETH.
  6. Enter the amount that you want to swap.
  7. Select the token you want to swap to. Example: DAI.
  8. Click Get Quotes to proceed. Note: you can manually select a different quote from our range of industry-leading providers.
  9. Click Swap to confirm.

Success! ğŸ¦Š

Ready to start swapping crypto? If youâ€™re on desktop, download MetaMask Extension. If youâ€™re on mobile, download MetaMask app for iOS or Android.

Need more help? We got you. Check out our MetaMask Support guide about swapping crypto.

nodes.metaDescription: Discover how to swap cryptocurrencies easily with MetaMask's self-custodial crypto wallet. Follow our step-by-step guide to securely exchange cryptocurrencies.
